title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go         Potomac Heritage Trail featuring C&O Canal section. NPS image   Did you know that the Cheseapeake and Ohio Canal is a component of several other National Trail Systems?  If you want to expand your trip and see more check out these pages! Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Appalachian National Scenic Trail
